document_data.name: Yoastal
document_data.mainbody: '''Yoastal''' was a [[yuan-ti pureblood]] [[ghost]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History: Yoastal was a priestess in the yuan-ti temple inside the [[Slitherswamp]] level. In [[1491 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} the [[naga]]s of the [[Slitherswamp|Ssethian Scourges]] slaughtered the yuan-ti and Yoastal among them. However, she rose again as a ghost hunting the former temple.
document_data.Activities: As ghost, Yoastal haunted the temple. She tried to pose as a priest of [[Mask]] and direct adventurers to attack the nagas with the secret objective to escalate the war between the nagas and the newly arrived [[bullywug]]s.
